Class Summary
Class Description
Encryption
The Encryption class provides methods for encrypting and decrypting text using the VigenÃ¨re cipher.
InputHandler
The InputHandler class provides methods for reading text from files and printing text to the console.
main
The main class contains the main method which provides a command-line interface for encrypting and decrypting text files using the VigenÃ¨re cipher.
OutputHandler
The OutputHandler class provides methods for writing text to files.
StringEditor
The StringEditor class provides methods for editing strings, specifically for the preparation of encryption and after decryption operations.
